brand.name: Tax Star
brand.primaryCTA: Book a demo or start a free trial

facts.text: Tax Star provides AI-powered corporate tax software.
facts.evidence: Tax Star provides AI-powered corporate tax software specifically designed for businesses in the UAE.

facts.text: The software is designed for businesses in the UAE.
facts.evidence: specifically designed for businesses in the UAE.

facts.text: The platform simplifies compliance with corporate tax regulations.
facts.evidence: The platform aims to simplify compliance with corporate tax regulations.

facts.text: Tax Star offers tools for tax calculations, financial statement production, and practice management.
facts.evidence: offering tools for tax calculations, financial statement production, and practice management.

facts.text: The AI-powered corporate tax calculator automates tax return processes.
facts.evidence: AI-Powered Corporate Tax Calculator: Automates tax return processes.

facts.text: The software facilitates the production of IFRS financial statements.
facts.evidence: Facilitates the production of financial statements in compliance with corporate tax laws.

facts.text: Automated workflows reduce manual calculations and administrative tasks.
facts.evidence: Automated Workflows: Reduces manual calculations and administrative tasks.

facts.text: The software saves up to 40% of time spent on manual calculations.
facts.evidence: Increased Efficiency: Automates tax processes, saving up to 40% of time spent on manual calculations.

facts.text: The software enables firms to handle 30-40% more clients without additional staff.
facts.evidence: Scalability: Enables firms to handle 30-40% more clients without the need to hire additional staff.

facts.text: The software helps avoid penalties through timely reminders and automated compliance tracking.
facts.evidence: Compliance Assurance: Helps businesses avoid penalties through timely reminders and automated compliance tracking.

facts.text: Doc expiry reminders notify users of upcoming document expirations.
facts.evidence: Doc Expiry Reminders: Notifies users of upcoming document expirations to avoid penalties.

facts.text: The software includes client and manager approval flows.
facts.evidence: Client & Manager Approval Flows: Streamlines approval processes for internal and client-related tasks.
ERP Integrations: Seamlessly integrates with existing ERP systems to enhance workflow efficiency.

facts.text: Audit trails maintain records for compliance and auditing purposes.
facts.evidence: Audit Trails: Maintains records for compliance and auditing purposes.

facts.text: Target customers include accounting practice owners, tax advisors, and ERP resellers.
facts.evidence: Target Customers: Accounting practice owners, Tax advisors, ERP resellers.

facts.text: Use cases include corporate tax calculations and financial statement production.
facts.evidence: Use Cases: Corporate tax calculations, Financial statement production.

facts.text: The website encourages booking a demo or starting a free trial.
facts.evidence: Interested customers are encouraged to book a demo or start a free trial.
